subject: response for ticket #9958
description_text:
Hello support team,

I would like an update on ticket #9958 regarding the pedal control box and
if it has been shipped yet?

Thanks.

conversations.body_text: Hi D. W.,     We sincerely apologize for the delay in processing your replacement order. We have now arranged for its shipment. Here is your tracking link:    https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047241225801

Hi support team,

No worries and thanks for the update, i will let you guys know if i still
have any issues after receiving the control box.


On Wed, 14 Jan 2026 at 08:03, service@simsonn.com
Hi D. W.,     Sure, feel free to reach out to us with any questions. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
